# Scripts

Bundled resources for network-latency-analyzer skill

- [x] analyze_request_patterns.py: Analyzes network request patterns to identify serial requests that can be parallelized.
- [x] connection_pool_optimizer.py: Recommends optimal connection pool sizes based on observed network traffic.
- [x] timeout_optimizer.py: Suggests timeout adjustments based on latency analysis.
- [x] request_batcher.py: Implements request batching to reduce overhead.
- [x] latency_simulator.py: Simulates network latency under different conditions to test optimizations.
